page.title: 18Cilcain/Pantymwyn: Societies
page.content: There is an active social life for villagers of all ages. In Cilcain a pre-school playgroup is run for the very young. Many older children are members of local scout and guide groups, and a youth club for older teenagers meets weekly and offers a varied programme, including sporting fixtures against other clubs in the area. The Cilcain Young Farmers' Club, open to all young adults, also has a an interesting programme of events. There are branches of the Womens' Institute in Cilcain and Pantymwyn, and older residents are catered for by an 'over-fifties' club in Pantymwyn. The golf club here attracts members from a wide area, while in Cilcain a bowling-green has been newly created. The village halls are the venue of many meetings,that in Cilcain having been recently improved and extended.
